# What is R-Ladies?

- R-Ladies is a world-wide organization with the mission of promoting **gender diversity in the R community**  

- Started in San Francisco in 2012  

- Currently has **140+ chapters and more than 15,000** members globally  
<center>
![](https://rladies.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/R-Ladies.png)

# R-Ladies St. Louis 

* Started in September 2017 by Jenine Harris and Chelsea West 

* 4 Meetups in 2017-2018, 5 Meetups in 2018-2019, and 5 planned for 2019-2020!
   
    - **TODAY! Our 11th Meetup!** Cleaning messy data in R with **Crystal Lewis** (PRC) 

    - Feb 12: Introduction to R Shiny with **Dr. Angelique Zeringue** (Mercy Hospital) 

    - Mar 17: Qualitative analysis in R with **Mary Painter** (UMSL) 

    - Apr 2: Making personal websites with blogdown with **Dr. Dorris Scott** (WUSTL)
    
* RSVP on Meetup
